In order to live a more fulfilling life,...
...you must first know what your values are.
Values are those things that are most important to you in life...
...and which guide the choices that you make.
When we compare our actions with our values,...
...we gain insight into whether or not our actions...
...are aligned with who we want to be.
If you find yourself doing things that don't match up...
...with what really matters to you most in life,...
